a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Foreign aid given as a share of national income
Official development assistance (ODA) divided by gross national income. From 2018, the official reporting method
switched from net to grant-equivalent amounts.
Note: The United Nations' target is for developed countries to devote 0.7% of their national income to ODA.
